game.name: Mermaid Or Princess
game.description:
Oh great! What a lovely experience is to help your favorite princess to decide which look between the mermaid and princess looks better on him! Elsa is confused on what look between the mermaid and princess she should carry before leaving her home for a special event. Do you think that you can help her decide and look awesome? Join Elsa Mermaid Or Princess Game and be prepared to guide the girl to decide which look suits her personality the most like a mermaid or like a princess!

When you click the play button, you will find your princess in two different dresses in a mermaid look and in a princess outfit. Start it by dressing her up as a mermaid first and then move on towards helping the girl to grab the perfect princess look! Give her a blue bra with a star in its middle or choose an orange color bra with two stars or choose a plain pink color bra for the lady! Now combine it with a matching bottom and a tiara with colorful flowers in this brand new girls game.

Now click the next button and get ready to dress her up as a princess then. Choose a nice white color gown with a note on the bra and some fringes or give her a gown with design in pink color on its border! Accessorize her look with a matching jewelry item, and a pair of suitable sandals in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Finally decide what look make her the cutest as a princess or as a mermaid! Good luck to create more awesome looks in our top liked dress-up games and have fun without download!
